title: The Mechanicals
description: Hara and Gideon have been summoned by the Emperor to do a favor for the Empire. They are to rescue a runaway bride who has fallen into the clutches of an evil Duke. Things get complicated when the Groom insists on accompanying them on the rescue attempt and they discover that the Duke is more evil than they thought. As he is attempting to take over the Empire.
author: Nix Whittaker
